definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: This course is an elective course for graduate students in School of Mechanical Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 本课程是机械与动力工程学院研究生的一门选修课。

sentences.english: In the school of foreign languages, several advanced options are offered for students in their junior or senior years.
sentences.chinese: 外语学院为大三和大四的学生开设了高级选修课。

sentences.english: These last from four to six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 选修课学程为四到六周时间。

sentences.english: The optional course of the specialty is an important part in the curriculum of the higher learning institutions.
sentences.chinese: 专业选修课是高等师范院校课程设置的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Elective courses include project or thesis upon approval by the advisor.
sentences.chinese: 选修课还包括有指导教授的课题研究及论文课程。

definition: (at a school) to take as an elective/an elective/elective (subject)
general course/general education course/core course/general curriculum/general education curriculum/core curriculum
Introduction to Maoism (subject)/abbr. for 毛澤東思想概論|毛泽东思想概论[Mao2 Ze2 dong1 Si1 xiang3 Gai4 lun4]
(coll.) to sit in on a class
credit system/grading system (in schools, universities etc)
